ch0021_91_green/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You wanted to see me?
ch0021_91_green/0101_0701_02_10:
Show me how much you’ve grown with
your partner!
ch0021_91_green/7101_0701_01_10:
We got stronger after awakening the power
of our arc suit!
ch0021_91_green/7101_0701_02_10: Feast your eyes! This is what I, Kanto’s—
ch0021_91_green/7101_0701_03_10:
or actually, PASIO’s—top-level Trainer, can
really do!
ch0021_91_green/7102_0701_01_10:
Your bond with your partner Pokémon is
essential to awakening your arc suit.
ch0021_91_green/7102_0701_02_10:
Whenever I think about that, I remember
something my gramps always says...
ch0021_91_green/7102_0701_03_10: “Treat your Pokémon with trust and love.”
ch0021_91_green/7102_0701_04_10:
I keep those words in my heart, which is
probably what led me to my arc suit.
ch0021_91_green/7103_0701_01_10:
We’ve got a lot of standout Trainers in
Kanto!
ch0021_91_green/7103_0701_02_10:
If I keep training ’em up, they’ll be
world-class in no time!
ch0021_91_green/7104_0701_01_10:
Pidgeot and I kick up a real storm when I’m
in my arc suit!
ch0021_91_green/7104_0701_02_10:
Come at us half-hearted, and you’ll get
blown away!
ch0021_91_green/7104_0701_03_10:
If you wanna get stronger, you better keep
up like your life depends on it!
ch0021_91_green/7105_0701_01_10:
You’re strong, [Name:PlayerNickname ]—
I’ll give you that. But remember, there’s
always someone better.
ch0021_91_green/7105_0701_02_10:
Even if you’re on a winning streak,
never get too cocky.
ch0021_91_green/7105_0701_03_10:
Otherwise, you may feel what being served
a painful defeat is like!
ch0021_91_green/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, great timing! I’ve something cool
for you.
ch0021_91_green/1701_0702_01_10:
A reward from yours truly! You should use it
to get stronger!
ch0021_91_green/2501_0701_01_10:
Arc suits are probably just one part of
Arceus’s power.
ch0021_91_green/2501_0701_02_10:
We must seem small and insignificant to
Pokémon like Arceus, who have so much.
ch0021_91_green/2501_0701_03_10: The scale’s so huge, it makes me uneasy.
ch0021_91_green/2501_0702_01_10:
We may be small, but as long as we work
together...
ch0021_91_green/2501_0702_02_10:
we’ll show the big guys we won’t go down
without a fight!
ch0021_91_green/2501_0702_03_10: We’ll show Arceus that all of us can shine!
ch0021_91_green/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m now looking after the Viridian City Gym,
which used to be Giovanni’s hideout.
ch0021_91_green/2511_0701_02_10:
I don’t really like to get tied down, so I
always said no when asked to become
a Gym Leader.
ch0021_91_green/2511_0701_03_10:
But when I finally said yes, I made sure I
was ready, ’cause it was a big decision!
ch0021_91_green/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m sure you’ll run into important decisions
of your own.
ch0021_91_green/2511_0702_02_10:
When you run into stuff you can’t escape,
you just gotta go for it!
ch0021_91_green/3001_0701_01_10:
Starting off right is always important!
Get your act together in the morning to
kick-start your day!
ch0021_91_green/3003_0701_01_10:
Whether you’re super focused or resting,
you’ll burn out if you don’t change gears.
ch0021_91_green/3005_0701_01_10:
Might not be a good idea to walk alone at
night. Shall I go with you?
